title: ðŸš¨ Jaguars Release Leonard Fournette (08/31 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Well, that didn't take long. Sure we thought this was a possibility, but the timing of Leonard Fournette's release seems a bit surprising. So, now what? Which Jaguars RB will step up? Is it the Ryquell Armstead show or will there be a committee? Is Chris Thompson worth drafting and are we moving Gardner Minshew up in the rankings? And what about Fournette? Should he be drafted ahead of the Jaguars RBs? We answer all of those questions and go over all of the RBs that Jacksonville drafted Fournette over in 2017.Â 
Bid on a spot in the 2020 Listeners' League (all proceeds to St. Jude): https://www.ebay.com/itm/373174782775

content:encoded:
Well, that didn't take long. Sure we thought this was a possibility, but the timing of Leonard Fournette's release seems a bit surprising. So, now what? Which Jaguars RB will step up? Is it the Ryquell Armstead show or will there be a committee? Is Chris Thompson worth drafting and are we moving Gardner Minshew up in the rankings? And what about Fournette? Should he be drafted ahead of the Jaguars RBs? We answer all of those questions and go over all of the RBs that Jacksonville drafted Fournette over in 2017.Â
